content: 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat whit s knits granny chic crocheted hat february 1 2008 purl bee this hat s really fun to make partly because it goes so fast but also because it s an interesting stitch pattern with big groups of triple crochets coming together and veering apart i learned this stitch from the harmony guide s book 220 more crochet stitches they call it i 69 which seems a little dry to me what about the flying gull stitch or the hocus crocus whatever you want to call it have fun making it and think of granny www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 1/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat 1 skein of worsted weight yarn i used manos del uruguay s handspun semi­ solid wool in the color cirrus #39 1 size i crochet hook the background fabric is kokka fabric s trefle gauze in blue trees www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 2/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat g a u g e 3 single crochets = 1 t o f i t women s size medium s p e c i a l a b b r e v i a t i o n s dtr treble_crochet yo yarn over 3 times insert hook into the work yo and pull through work yo and pull through the first two loops yo and pull through the next 2 loops 2 times double dtr group 3 dtr into same single_crochet as last group until 1 loop of each remains on hook 4 loops on hook *skip 5 single_crochet into 6th single_crochet work 3 dtr until 1 loop of each remains on hook yo and pull through all 7 loops on hook t o b e g i n www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 3/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat round 1 chain chain 6 slip_stitch in first chain to make a ring round 2 12 single_crochet single_crochet in ring slip_stitch into first single_crochet 12 stitches round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * to end of round 18 stitches round 4 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 sts repeat from * to end of round 24 stitches round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 sts repeat from * to end of round 30 stitches round 6 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 4 sts repeat from * to end of round 36 stitches round 7 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 sts repeat from * to end of round 42 stitches round 8 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 6 sts repeat from * to end
